about_the_game:
Chronicon: Survivors is a horde survival game based on the ARPG Chronicon.
Fight a mix of familiar and new dangerous foes in fast paced 20 minute rounds, featuring random events, boss fights, and more!
Obtain gold to permanently unlock skills, perks, masteries and even items in a passive skill tree.

Advance through 6 different and increasingly challenging maps to unlock more items, weapons, and a total of 10 playable characters - each with an unique weapon and passive skill. Each map features 2 bosses with unique attack patterns to keep you on your toes. Every weapon offers a choice of upgrades, letting you pick the upgrade path you want, such as increased range, attack speed, number of projectiles, etc. Create the build and style you want to play - and banish the items you don't want.

Can you survive?

Features

  • 20 minute rounds
  • 10 playable characters
  • 6 maps
  • 60 items & weapons
  • Weapons don't just stack - you pick the upgrades
  • Passive skill tree as meta progression
  • A Mastery upgrade for each character, offering a new unique effect
  • Each map offers a set of unique enemies, events, bosses, and unlocks
  • Codex with stats on characters, items, and general gameplay

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core 3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and Shader Model 3.0 Compatible Dedicated Video Card, 1 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Intel (integrated) graphics poorly supported. Dedicated GPU required!

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
